mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESERVATION (RESERVATION_NO, BODYSHOP_NO, MEMBER_NO, CAR_NO, KEY, KEY_EXPIRE_TIME, RESERVATION_TIME, REPAIRED_TIME, REPAIRED_PERSON) VALUES (#{RESERVATION_ID}, #{BODYSHOP_NO}, #{MEMBER_NO}, #{CAR_NO}, #{KEY}, #{KEY_EXPIRE_TIME}, #{RESERVATION_TIME}, #{REPAIRED_TIME}, #{REPAIRED_PERSON})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM RESERVATION ORDER BY RESERVATION_NO DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE RESERVATION SET KEY=#{KEY} where RESERVATION_NO =#{RESERVATION_NO}
